data.description: At the start of your turn, you can take 1 Drive Stress to create an ANTIMATTER SHELL around your or an allyʼs Drive. The shell lasts until its target takes any Impact — then it detonates, reducing the Impact by 1 and dealing 3 Harm to a Matched foe. You can create any number of ANTIMATTER SHELLS, but their effects donʼt stack.
